message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be a great fit for you, and I'm confident it's worth at least $12,000 to you. To make this a smooth process, I'm offering it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I know the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $11,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product holds, I am willing to pay $10,500 for it.
